entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
